summary: Hidan\'s three bladed scythe from Naruto
descriptionHtml:
Ok so here is the resized and retextured hidans scythe. Craftable under daedric for those who dont know. Should look more less flat and more realistic than the first version. Enjoy! :)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

So this is the second weapon I made and got into skyrim so its not perfect. I still dont know how to make the handle look more realistic like a cloth wrap material. I think its cool and what not so enjoy. Not entirely lore friendly I suppose but whatever. 


My mods:
Hidans Scythe - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16401
Infinity Blade - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17255
Legion Helmet - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18341
Phoenix Katana - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16935
Stormfang Blade - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18494
Grayson Sword - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17552
Zabuzas Executioner Blade - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16753
author: siberok92
